title: Lentil, red pepper and sweet potato soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '180g lardons (British or Italian)', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 teaspoon dried chilli flakes, or to taste', '1 teaspoon mild curry powder, or to taste', '2 teaspoons Hungarian paprika, or to taste', '1 onion, chopped', '1 small leek, chopped', '2 sticks of celery, chopped', '1 medium sweet potato, peeled and chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '1 roasted red pepper', '190g red lentils', '900ml (1 1/2 pt) vegetable stock', '2 bay leaves', '1 teaspoon freshly ground sea salt', 'freshly ground black pepper']
